document_name: National Policy for Women and Second Plan for Gender Equality and Equity of Honduras 2010-2022
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/HND/2010/HND-2010-12-25-National Policy for Women and Second Plan for Gender Equality and Equity of Honduras 2010-2022_6b326d1fd9a82291e3ee3b477c8de1c5.pdf
document_description: One of the challenged highlighted by the policy is the adoption of a gender approach in strategies related to climate change, forest management plans, energy, biodiversity, water, risk management and protected areas.
